lines.text: [Angela tackled the boy who threw a doll at her sister Ellie]
You could've killed my sister!
[boy doesn't say anything so she says to Ellie]
Sit on his head.
[Ellie sits on the boy's head]
Get the kid away from me!
Apologize or she'll fart!
Sorry...
Say, I'm very very sorry Ellie and I love your smile.
I'm very very sorry Ellie and I love your smile.
OK Ellie. Take it away.
[Ellie gets up]
[Angela is explaining to Ellie all about sex using the horse as an example]
See this?
Yeah.
That's exactly what men have. They stick it in the women. I've seen mom and dad do it. It looks like it hurts.
Why do they do it then?
It's a rule. You have to.
I don't wanna do it.
Well if you don't do it by the time you're 21 you start getting smaller.
How come?
Cuz there's certain vitamins and I don't know but I've seen people like that. They're mom's age and they're as small as you.
And they shrank?
Yeah, it happens little by little.

[thinking she is seeing the devil in front of her, hiding her eyes and praying]
Mary, full of grace, take away this ugly face. Mary, full of grace, take away this ugly face.
